page.description: UNDECLARE removes an externally defined function (for example a Windows API function).

section.title: Example
section.description: Declare some structures to use - a rectangle and a 1024 character buffer.
section.example: declare user32 GetWindowRect LL(rect) declare user32 gwt@GetWindowText LL(text) as L undeclare GetWindowRect undeclare gwt@GetWindowText
